projects.name: Data Enrichment Platform
projects.description: The Data Enrichment Platform is a flexible software platform for performing data enrichment by executing various algorithms on a collection of documents, retrieved from a certain data source system. The enrichment result are often annotated texts and images, but can also be new documents/images/..., e.g. in case of machine translation.
projects.responsibilities: Platform Setup & Deployment, Stream components implementation, CI/CD, Monitoring & Alerting Setup, Performance Tests
projects.technologies: Java 11, Kubernetes, Kafka, Spring [Cloud Dataflow, Cloud Stream, Cloud Function, Batch, Boot], MongoDB

projects.name: Ansera
projects.description: Ansera is a search engine for patent information. The goal is to deliver highly relevant documents before the examiner starts working on a patent application. It provides search with plain text (find similar), custom domain-specific query language, and search for similar figures.
projects.responsibilities: DSL grammar implementation, AST to Lucene translation, Custom search queries
projects.technologies: Java 8, Kubernetes, ElasticSearch, Lucene, ANTLR, Spring, Hibernate, JUnit, Maven

projects.name: Event Service
projects.description: Event Service is an extension to VMWare vCenter which uses polling-based approach to handle servers monitoring events through CIM and SNMP indications. Through Event Service extension VMWare Infrastructure (e.g. vSphere Web Client plugins) can operate vendor-specific information.
projects.responsibilities: Implementation the SNMP protocol, user authentication mechanism, SSL certificates verification, performance tuning, communication with customers, requirements analysis, team management, documentation
projects.technologies: Java, Spring, Hibernate, Flex, H2database, SBLIM CIM Client, SNMP4j, SOAP, JUnit, Maven

projects.name: SPM
projects.description: The goal of SPM is a monitoring and managing power consumption of PRIMERGY servers. SPM supports discovery and tracking for these servers and power management using IPMI, SNMP, CIM, CLP protocols.
projects.responsibilities: Implementation the CLP protocol, SOAP part implementation, JVM performance tuning, bugfixing
projects.technologies: Java, Tomcat, Jetty, Hibernate, Spring, Apache Wicket, Quartz, H2database, MS SQL, PostgreSQL, JUnit SMNP4j, IPMI, WinPCAP, SBLIM CIM Client

projects.name: VIOM
projects.description: The goal of the project is allow the configuration and management the input/output parameters of the PRIMERGY Blade Servers as well as the LAN connection modules and Intelligent Blade Panel (IBP), virtualizing and saving the server blade-specific I/O parameters in a hardware-independent server profile.
projects.responsibilities: Support of IPMI protocol, encryption algorithms (HMAC-SHA1, HMAC-SHA1-96, AES-CBC-128), SSH performance improvements, build system improvements, bugfixing, communication with customers, requirements analysis, team management, documentation
projects.technologies: Java, Swing, Hibernate, MS SQL, PostgreSQL, IPMI, Ganymed SSH, Maverick SSH, Quartz, Apache Ant, JUnit, Mockito, PowerMock
